body_html: Ah, of course, thanks for the explanation. Perhaps it would be possible to slightly modify tf.sparse_tensor_dense_matmul to have a defined shape when the shape argument is passed as an array? That would be a pretty easy change, no?
body_text: Ah, of course, thanks for the explanation. Perhaps it would be possible to slightly modify tf.sparse_tensor_dense_matmul to have a defined shape when the shape argument is passed as an array? That would be a pretty easy change, no?
body: Ah, of course, thanks for the explanation. Perhaps it would be possible to slightly modify tf.sparse_tensor_dense_matmul to have a defined shape when the `shape` argument is passed as an array? That would be a pretty easy change, no?
